name: Fantasy Ball Shoot - Home Pet Play
name_original: Fantasy Ball Shoot - Home Pet Play
description:
Fantasy Ball Shoot - Home Pet Play is a classic match-3 game. It's really simple and addictive.
Every puzzle like a war, your mission is to clear all the bubbles, less and quick shots to prove your strength.
Hit the crazy bubbles, Let's Shoot!
How to play:
1.Combination 3 or more same balls to make them burst.
2.Destroy all the buubles to level up.
